name: copyparty-config
content:
# Copyparty configuration for HomeLab

# Basic settings
[global]
port = 3923
host = 0.0.0.0

# File upload settings
max_upload_size = 1073741824  # 1GB
allow_upload = true
allow_delete = true

# Security settings
enable_cors = false
allow_dotfiles = false

# Logging
log_level = info
log_file = /var/log/copyparty.log

# Volume configuration
[volumes]
# Public upload folder
/mnt/public:rw,upload

# Private folder (read-only for guests)
/mnt/private:r
